description.value:
Before you make an attack roll with a melee weapon, melee spell attack, or unarmed strike with which you are proficient, you can choose to forgo your proficiency modifier to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you can use your bonus action make a breath weapon attack. When you use your breath weapon, each creature in a 15 foot cone originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 8 + your proficiency bonus + the modifier used to hit with the melee weapon attack, melee spell attack, or unarmed strike. A creature takes your choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage equal to twice your proficiency modifier on a failed saving throw, or half as much on a success.

The default save DC for this feature is set to Strength, if you attack with Dexterity either make a copy of this feature and modify it to Dexterity or modify this one.

activation.condition: when you hit with an attack where you decided to forgo your proficiency modifier
